actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d10 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Roar
actions.desc: When a mahoru roars all creatures with hearing within 30 feet of it must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened until the end of the mahoru's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it's also paralyzed for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Roar of all mahoru for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Vorpal Bite
actions.desc:
a mahoru's saw-like jaws are excel at dismembering prey. When the mahoru scores a critical hit, the target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or lose an appendage. Roll on the following table for the result:

1-2: right hand

3-4: left hand

5-6: right food

7-8: left foot

9: right forearm

10: left forearm

11: right lower leg

12: left lower leg

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The mahoru can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Keen Sight and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The mahoru has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The mahoru has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the mahoru's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

special_abilities.name: Blood Frenzy
special_abilities.desc: The mahoru has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that isn't at maximum hit points.
